title: Saul Rejected as King
summary: God commands Saul to destroy the Amalekites completely, but Saul spares King Agag and the best livestock. Samuel confronts him, and though Saul tries to justify his actions, God rejects him as king. Samuel puts Agag to death himself.

faq.question: What command did Saul disobey?
faq.answer: He did not completely destroy the Amalekites and their possessions as God commanded.
